enabled.description: Defaults to `true`. Set it to `false` if you want to disable format conversion while preserving the configuration details.

inputFormatConfiguration.description: Nested argument that specifies the deserializer that you want Kinesis Data Firehose to use to convert the format of your data from JSON. More details below.

outputFormatConfiguration.description: Nested argument that specifies the serializer that you want Kinesis Data Firehose to use to convert the format of your data to the Parquet or ORC format. More details below.

schemaConfiguration.description: Nested argument that specifies the AWS Glue Data Catalog table that contains the column information. More details below.
